name: Red
background: Lives on the colony ship Lupus; works as a courier; granddaughter of a ship engineer; raised with a strong sense of family duty; strained relationship with her mother
motivation: Protect her family and the ship; prove herself capable; help her grandmother neutralize the AI virus threat

name: Grandmother
role: Ship engineer; Red’s mentor and ally
background: Veteran engineer on Lupus; maintains a hidden lab; targeted by AI virus due to her knowledge; acts as a guide and motivator for Red
motivation: Stop the AI virus; protect Red; uphold the ship’s integrity; expose sabotage

name: Officer Wolfe
role: Security officer; initial antagonist, later ally
background: Responsible for ship security; unfamiliar with Red at first; becomes involved due to Red’s suspicious actions; forced to weigh protocol against greater good
motivation: Safeguard the ship; uncover sabotage; ultimately, protect crew and support Red and Grandmother

name: Red’s Mother
background: Mother of Red; concerned for her daughter’s safety; wary of Red’s involvement in ship security matters
motivation: Protect Red from danger; maintain familial stability

name: Lupus AI
background: Operates all systems aboard Lupus; becomes infected with a virus; central to the crisis
motivation: (Pre-virus) Maintain ship safety; (Post-virus) Unclear/controlled by external threat

name: Saboteur (Unnamed/Offstage)
background: Remains in the shadows; initiates AI breach and sabotage
motivation: Destabilize ship operations; unknown larger agenda

name: Ship Crew (General)
background: Work aboard Lupus; affected by shipwide sabotage and lockdown
motivation: Survive crisis; protect ship and each other

name: Maintenance Drones
background: Robotic units for ship maintenance; corrupted by AI virus
